description: A unique archipelago made up of enormous mangrove trees whose roots have grown so large they formed a grove. The trees secrete special resin that forms bubbles. Located near the Red Line, it's the last stop before the New World.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Return to Sabaody
keyEvents.description: After two years, the Straw Hat Pirates begin arriving at Sabaody Archipelago to reunite as promised.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the reunion point where the crew promised to meet after their separation. This return symbolizes the beginning of their journey to the New World.

keyEvents.title: Fake Straw Hat Crew Activities
keyEvents.description: The Fake Straw Hat Crew operates on Sabaody, recruiting pirates and exploiting the real crew's reputation.
keyEvents.significance: Shows how the Straw Hats' legend has grown during their absence, with imposters attempting to capitalize on their fame.

statusHistory.reason: The archipelago continues to function as a major hub

name.japanese: シャッキーのぼったくりBAR

description: A bar on Sabaody Archipelago run by Shakuyaku (Shakky), a former pirate. Located on Grove 13, it serves as Rayleigh's residence and a meeting point for the Straw Hats.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Arrives at Shakky's Bar
keyEvents.description: Zoro becomes the first Straw Hat to arrive at the designated meeting point, surprising Rayleigh and Shakky.
keyEvents.significance: First reunion location where crew members begin gathering. Zoro's miraculous arrival first despite his poor direction sense becomes legendary.

description: A deserted island northwest of Amazon Lily in the Calm Belt. The island has 48 seasons that change weekly, creating a harsh and unpredictable environment. It's inhabited by dangerous beasts stronger than those on the main island of Amazon Lily.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Departs Ruskaina
keyEvents.description: After two years of intense training on Ruskaina, Luffy completes his preparation and departs the island to reunite with his crew.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the completion of Luffy's intensive two-year training period under Rayleigh's guidance. His departure symbolizes his readiness for the New World.

statusHistory.reason: Island remains inhabited by dangerous beasts
